ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hard ... days ... Like I said, tedious.... the PB Cloak is a very nice item, though, and is ALL/ALL, so selling it is hardly a problem. The rarity of Karg
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----

: From: MFerrulo@...
:
: I'm not sure Polar Bear cloaks are the way to go. Karg Icebear is very
hard
: to find these days as so many people are killing him (not like the old
days
: when you could always find him wandering around).

Like I said, tedious.... the PB Cloak is a very nice item, though, and is
ALL/ALL, so selling it is hardly a problem. The rarity of Karg serves to
make the prices even higher. I think that nowadays one could get 20 p per
cloak on Faydwer... if one were a shrewd trader, at least. :)

: Here is my newbie money raising secret. Collect Batwings. Sell them in
: batches of 20. Many higher lvl Wizards will pay 10pp or more for a batch
of
: 20 wings cause we don't want to bother hunting bats.

This doesn't work much anymore... Bat Wings are purchasable in unlimited
amounts in Kithicor and West Freeport (probably other zones as well, Ogguk
or Grobb almost ceratinly) for about 14 copper each. People are beginning to
know this. :)
